name: Momentum Labs
description:
[This development of this game is currently on hold]

Explore a strange lab and find out what happened to the researchers that worked there.

Use the new principles of unused momentum discovered by the lab, to fill in holes to access and explore new places, and find new gadgets to solve more puzzles. 

Notes :
- The game auto-saves your progress, so you can take a break at any time if you are stuck.
- The difficulty may be quite challenging near the end of the game, but the first area/s should be relatively approachable.

The game is still in development, however, is currently on hold to work on other projects. The development will continue when I have some feedback on the difficulty.
